mQuestValues.4: 4 Spring: Head to the Spring Shrine, find the plate, solve the puzzle (pay respect to the dead by taking a flower from a grave and bringing it to an empty grave, do this once for each flower type). This gives the Spring tag.

mQuestValues.4: 4 Fall: Head to the Fall Shrine, find the plate, step on another plate. This gives the Fall tag.

mQuestValues.1: Head to Sunken Tomb, go to the lava area under the PoI hit the button at -315 14 81. This sets score to 2. If you leave the area and return to the puzzle room with a score of 3 to 6 your score is reset to 2
mQuestValues.2: Walk forward in the puzzle room.
mQuestValues.3: Move forward until it mentions the barrier. Typically this will happen at the same point as the message to get to 3.
mQuestValues.4: Drop into the water and hit the button at -1444 15 -1155. This also creates a waterfall on the other side of the room if it isn’t already active. Hitting the button with a score of 5 will recreate the waterfall preventing a softlock
mQuestValues.5: Head to the other side of the room, swim up the waterfall and through the 1 block gap. Then hit the button. This button will recreate the waterfall at a score of 6 if it has vanished to prevent a softlock
mQuestValues.6: You can now walk through the barrier and get the Apotheosis Spear from the chest.
mQuestValues.7: Take the Apotheosis Spear back to Zulamar. Pick a reward
mQuestValues.8: Quest Complete

mQuestValues.2: Speak to Foreman Boris (184,110,43), then make your way through the mine and speak to Sani (-1393 168 -1254) to get a pickaxe.
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 1: Speak to Leeton (-1343 177 -1238) he will take your pickaxe and give you the tag Leeton1. Return to Sani (-1393 168 -1254) for another pickaxe
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 2: Speak to Leeton (-1343 177 -1238) he will take your pickaxe and give you the tag Leeton2. Return to Sani (-1393 168 -1254) for another pickaxe
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 3: Speak to Leeton (-1343 177 -1238) he will take your pickaxe and give you the tag Leeton3. Speak to Leeton again to see a short cutscene and to get Permafrost Ice. If you lose the Permafrost Ice you can repeat Part 1 to 3
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 4: Speak to Crispy Cal (-1364 171 -1246) with the Permafrost Ice. After a scene you will get an Empty Minecart. You can repeat the process if you lose the minecart.
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 5: Speak to Wall Boy (-1361 167 -1262) and believe them. You will get a Small Container. You can repeat the process if you lose it somehow.
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 6: Speak to Tiq and Toq (-1331 177 -1260). Select Secure it, Use what you have, and Start from the bottom. They will dig up endermites. Right-click the small container to put them into the container to get a “Small Container + Endermite”. If you lose the “Small Container + Endermite” you can talk to them to cause them to remine and capture the new Endermites in a different chest/Small Container.
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 7: Speak to Sani (-1393 168 -1254) with the Empty Minecart and the Small Container + Endermite. As to send the cart down the track. Observe the cutscene and get the Mineshaft Key. Should you lose it, repeat the step
mQuestValues.3: 3 Part 8: Hit the button that leads to the cyan lobby (-1397 159 -1278)
